A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Can't hold a candle to The Force Awakens. This movie is split between a boring and PC filler (literally running out of gas)\, and an interesting story with Luke and Rey on the island. Plot holes galore. It wouldn't bother me so much if it weren't for the glowing reviews by \"critics\" and youtubers who saw it early\, which are clearly biased and must have some cash incentive to positively review this mess. There are parts that are great\, but overwhelmingly bad.
